welcome.alreadyrunning: Le One-Click Miner est déjà en cours d'exécution. Vous ne pouvez pas l'exécuter plus d'une fois.
welcome.click_button_to_start: Cliquer sur le bouton ci-dessous pour redémarrer le minage.
welcome.makeapassword: Choisir un mot de passe. Ne le perdez pas!
welcome.password_cannot_be_empty: Le mot de passe ne peut être vide
welcome.password_mismatch: Le mot de passe ne correspond pas

checks.prerequisite: A prerequisite is being installed. You might see a popup asking for permissions (could just be blinking in the taskbar)

sending.send_all_to: Send all your mined coins to
sending.send_failed: Unable to send transaction. Check debug.log for more information

settings.enable_debug_sub: Include the miner's console output in the debug log. Can grow your logs quite large
settings.auto_start_sub: Start the One-Click Miner when you log in your computer
settings.closed_source_sub: Better hashrate, but unaudited miners that incurr a developer's fee
settings.closed_source_warning: You have selected to use closed source miner(s). Vertcoin does not endorse or support these miners. They cannot be audited on their contents and could contain functions that harm your computer.

tracking.tracking_enabled: Vous partagez anonymement vos statistiques d'utilisation
tracking.tracking_disabled: Vous ne partagez pas les statistiques d'utilisation
tracking.enable_tracking: Activer pour nous permettre d'améliorer votre expérience utilisateur
